title: 256.481 PERSON WITH A DISABILITY; DEFINITION.
text:
For the purposes of sections 256.481 to 256.482 "person with a disability" means any person who:
(1) has a physical, mental, or emotional impairment which substantially limits one or more major life activities;
(2) has a record of such an impairment; or
(3) is regarded as having such an impairment.
